description: Sets the prim's shape (legacy mode, DEPRECATED). 	[ 1, integer flag ] + flag_parameters
Sets the prim's material. 	[ PRIM_MATERIAL, integer flag ]
Sets the object's physics status. 	[ PRIM_PHYSICS, integer boolean ]
Sets the object's temporary attribute. 	[ PRIM_TEMP_ON_REZ, integer boolean ]
Sets the object's phantom status. 	[ PRIM_PHANTOM, integer boolean ]
Sets the prim's position. 	[ PRIM_POSITION, vector position ]
Sets the prim's size. 	[ PRIM_SIZE, vector size ]
Sets the prim's global rotation. 	[ PRIM_ROTATION, rotation rot ]
Sets the prim's shape. 	[ PRIM_TYPE, integer flag ] + flag_parameters
Sets the prim's texture attributes. 	[ PRIM_TEXTURE, integer face, string texture, vector repeats, vector offsets, float rotation_in_radians ]
Sets the face's color. 	[ PRIM_COLOR, integer face, vector color, float alpha ]
Sets the face's shiny & bump. 	[ PRIM_BUMP_SHINY, integer face, integer shiny, integer bump ]
Sets the face's full bright flag. 	[ PRIM_FULLBRIGHT, integer face, integer boolean ]
Sets the prim as flexible. 	[ PRIM_FLEXIBLE, integer boolean, integer softness, float gravity, float friction, float wind, float tension, vector force ]
Sets the face's texture mode. 	[ PRIM_TEXGEN, integer face, integer type ]
Sets the prim as a point light. 	[ PRIM_POINT_LIGHT, integer boolean, vector color, float intensity, float radius, float falloff ]
Sets the prim's cast shadow attribute. (DEPRECATED) 	[ PRIM_CAST_SHADOWS, integer boolean ]
Sets the face's glow attribute. 	[ PRIM_GLOW, integer face, float intensity ]
Sets the prim's floating text. 	[ PRIM_TEXT, string text, vector color, float alpha ]
Sets the prim's name. 	[ PRIM_NAME, string name ]
Sets the prim's description. 	[ PRIM_DESC, string description ]
Sets the prim's local rotation. 	[ PRIM_ROT_LOCAL, rotation rot ]
Sets the prim's physics shape type. 	[ PRIM_PHYSICS_SHAPE_TYPE, integer type ]
Sets the prim's spin to the specified axis and rate. 	[ PRIM_OMEGA, vector axis, float spinrate, float gain ]
Sets the prim's local position. 	[ PRIM_POS_LOCAL, vector position ]
Sets the next linknumber to use in the linkset. 	[ PRIM_LINK_TARGET, integer link_target ]
Sets the prim's slice (a shape attribute). 	[ PRIM_SLICE, vector slice ]

Sets the prim's specular map attributes. 	[ PRIM_SPECULAR, integer face, string texture, vector repeats, vector offsets, float rotation_in_radians, vector color, integer glossiness, integer environment ]
Sets the prim's normal map attributes. 	[ PRIM_NORMAL, integer face, string texture, vector repeats, vector offsets, float rotation_in_radians ]
Sets the prim's diffuse texture alpha rendering mode attributes. 	[ PRIM_ALPHA_MODE, integer face, integer alpha_mode, integer mask_cutoff ]
Avatars are allowed to manually stand up when seated on this prim. Only valid for prims in a valid experience. 	[ PRIM_ALLOW_UNSIT, integer flag ]
Avatars are not permitted to manually sit on this prim. 	[ PRIM_SCRIPTED_SIT_ONLY, integer flag ]
The sit target, if any defined for this prim. 	[ PRIM_SIT_TARGET, integer active, vector offset, rotation rot ]
